task.title: Creating Your First Mini Table of Contents
task.shortdesc: These are the steps you will perform in the source documents to create abbrev mini Table of Contents.

context.p: You will need to tag the title of the file "mini_tocs_for_moobile_devices.xml. This file can be found in the folder MiniTOCsForMobileDevices.

step.cmd: Find the DITA map Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap in the ePublisher Express Document Manager.
Right click on the Exploring-ePublisher.ditamap and select Explore Location.
Open the DITA file t_creating_your_fist_mini_toc.xml in your preferred editing tool.
In the title element, apply the output class “Title w_Mini TOC”
Generate output using ePublisher Express Trial project.
Navigate to the topic in the generated output and verify the mini-TOC.

result.p: Yep, it is that easy. This feature was enabled in the stationery using ePublisher Designer. The styling information of Title and Title w_Mini TOC are the same, so the output looks uninformed. The only difference is that under the latter, ePublisher sees the command to generate a mini Table of Contents after this topic. This gives the content creator the ability to place a mini Table of Contents on any title they choose, simply by labeling it with the correct paragraph style name.
